full_address: 24 Spinkbrae Street, Fig Tree Pocket, Qld 4069
listing_company_name: Chrissie Krummel Properties -  Fig Tree Pocket
description:
Designed to benefit from its breezy elevated position, this lovely home is perfectly placed for those seeking a quiet life close to the city.
Occupying a private and easy care 515sqm allotment, the home features multiple indoor and outdoor living spaces, four well-appointed bedrooms and expansive decks.

Thoughtfully composed, the light filled interiors are designed to seamlessly connect with the outdoors. Perfect for summer BBQs, the rear decks overlook the resort-style pool and established tropical gardens. Emerging onto the top deck you get the feeling you could be high in a delightful tree house.

A unique home, this well-planned residence offers a flexible and contemporary floorplan which will suit a family looking for more than one living space. Tweens, teens and adult children alike will love the large living area (with its own deck) positioned central to the downstairs bedrooms. A kitchenette compliments the area perfectly, ideal for those family movie nights, rowdy sleepovers or even violin practice!

Only 9km's to the CBD, and within close proximity to transport, first class shopping precincts and Brisbane's leading public and private academic institutions, this home provides the gateway for a wonderful and convenient lifestyle second to none.

Property features include but are not limited to:

- Perfectly positioned 515m2 allotment boasting river views and access
- Four bedrooms, two separate living spaces and two bathrooms
- Multiple indoor and outdoor living spaces
- Master suite revealing walk-in robe and sizable ensuite
- Fabulous downstairs activity room flowing onto deck, low maintenance yard and gardens and welcoming resort-style pool
- Several covered decks to enjoy all year round.
- Light filled kitchen overlooking indoor and outdoor living spaces.
- Separate family laundry.
- Gorgeous timber floors and neutral palette throughout.
- Two car garage accommodation with room for more outside.
- Large resort-style swimming pool, with well-established gardens and fully fenced yard.
-Fully enclosed storage room on ground level – ideal space for a handyman, or to store pool toys, bikes etc.
- Situated within close proximity to the CBD, The Western Freeway, public transport, fabulous amenities and Brisbane's leading public and private academic institutions allowing residents to enjoy an exceptional lifestyle in a wonderful community.

For further information or to arrange an inspection please call Chrissie on 0400 031 175 or email chrissie@ckproperties.com.au and start living the Fig Tree Pocket dream.

Disclaimer: This property is being sold without a price therefore a price guide cannot be provided. The website may have filtered the property into a price bracket for website functionality purposes.
